messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Wassup homies. It's ya boi here, reminding to have a good clean shift. Peace, y'all

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Russian Outreach Program

Cargo: A group of angry Russians want to have a party. Can you send them your cargo shuttle then make them disappear?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to a new program we have we are sending an offical to investigate your station and rate it on a scale of 1 to 100 have a nice day.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to the faulty inspector we sent you we eleminated him remotely have a nice day

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Toxins Storage.
